ygData.subject: Re: Polished Granite Tomahawk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And that s what we re trying to get at.  I m sure someone knows of a system out there to get the tomahawk, like how i said i got the chitin shield, and
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 May 1999, Clancy Cashion wrote:

> From: "Clancy Cashion" <tcashio3@...>
>
> When someone has to camp an item for days to get it, why would they sell it
> for a 20p? That would hardly be worth anything

And that's what we're trying to get at. I'm sure someone knows of a
system out there to get the tomahawk, like how i said i got the chitin
shield, and also the BBC. It would only take a very short time to get the
item if we knew the system, *hopefully* forcing the price of these items
down.

Nick
